trans-unit.source: Display test results in build status summary for each build result (network intensive!)
Please enter correct MSBuild path in the plugin settings dialog and try again.
Fetch every (seconds) - set to 0 to disable
Arguments of git command to run
Specify the base URL to Bitbucket
Your repository is not hosted in BitBucket Server.

Are you sure to delete {0} selected branches?
trans-unit.target: Sei sicuro di voler cancellare {0} branch selezionati?

trans-unit.source: Choose branches to delete. Only branches that are fully merged in '{0}' will be deleted.
DANGEROUS ACTION! Branches will be deleted on the remote '{0}'. This can not be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
Deleting unmerged branches will result in dangling commits. Use with caution!
Press '{0}' to search for branches to delete.
trans-unit.target: Premi '{0}' per cercare i branch da eliminare.

trans-unit.source: Select branches to delete using checkboxes in '{0}' column.
trans-unit.target: Seleziona i branch da eliminare mettendo le spunte nella colonna '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: Delete branches older than x days
trans-unit.target: Elimina i branch più vecchi di x giorni

trans-unit.source: Delete branches fully merged into branch
Branch where all branches should be merged in

Search branches that does not match regex
Remote name obsoleted branches should be deleted from
Use regex to filter branches to delete
Are you sure to delete the selected files?
trans-unit.target: Sei sicuro di voler cancellare i file selezionati?

trans-unit.source: Reset local changes before deleting files. Choose files to delete. Force push for replacing data on remote repository.
Your change has been submitted for review at the following location:
Could not retrieve the change details

trans-unit.target: Per favore selezionare un repository remoto

trans-unit.source: Enter the Change-Id or the number from the Gerrit URL

trans-unit.target: Per favore selezionare un repository remoto

trans-unit.source: Failed to save .gitreview. Check if file is accessible.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile salvare .gitreview. Verificare che il file sia accessibile.

trans-unit.source: .gitreview is only supported when there is a working directory.
trans-unit.target: .gitreview è supportato solo quando c'è una cartella di lavoro.

trans-unit.source:
Provide the configuration for .gitreview to setup Gerrit.
Example configuration:
[gerrit] host=review.example.com port=29418 project=department/project.git defaultbranch=master defaultremote=review defaultrebase=0

The Gerrit plugin for GitExtensions provides integration with Gerrit for GitExtensions. This plugin has been based on the git-review tool.
To enable Gerrit support for a repository, a .gitreview file must be created. This can be done through the Repository | Edit .gitreview menu option. See the link below for more information on the .gitreview file and the git-review tool.
Could not download the commit-msg file. Please install the commit-msg hook manually.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile scaricare il file commit-msg. Installa commit-msg hook manualmente.

trans-unit.source: Could not create the hooks folder. Please create the folder manually and try again.
Gerrit requires a commit-msg hook to be installed. Do you want to install the commit-msg hook into your repository?

trans-unit.target: Errore nel caricamento di del file .gitreview

trans-unit.source: The remote "{0}" specified with the "defaultremote" setting in the .gitreview file does not refer to a configured remote. Either create this remote or change the setting in the .gitreview file.
Cannot find the ".gitreview" file in the working directory.
The "host" setting in the .gitreview file is mandatory.
The "port" specified in the .gitreview file may only contain digits.
The "project" setting in the .gitreview file is mandatory.
A good branch model for your project with Git...
Result of git flow command run
Cannot find Gource. Please download Gource and set the path in the plugins settings dialog.

The current directory is not a valid git repository.
Gource can be only be started from a valid git repository.

There is no path to Gource configured.
Do you want to automatically download Gource?
Downloading failed. Please download Gource and set the path in the plugins settings dialog.
Gource has been downloaded and unzipped.
trans-unit.target: Gource è stato scaricato ed estratto.

trans-unit.source:
Cannot find Gource in the configured path: {0}.
